languages.text: {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Идеал..." {n}Она отворачивается к пропасти, глядя вниз, рассматривая улицы.{/n} "Все это время я считала, что моя стезя — благословение, дарованное мне и открывающее путь к совершенству. Но оказавшись здесь... взглянув на мир с высоты..."
languages.translation_comment: Запускаем этюд KibellahTaint, каунтер Synchronicity обнуляем

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Оковы..." {n}Она отворачивается к пропасти, глядя вниз, рассматривая улицы.{/n} "Все это время я считала, что моя стезя — благословение, дарованное избранной. Но оказавшись здесь... взглянув на мир с высоты..."

languages.translation_comment: Запускаем этюд KibellahTaint, каунтер Synchronicity обнуляем

languages.text: {n}Kibellah closes her eyes.{/n} "Perfection..." {n}She turns to gaze at the streets below.{/n} "All this time, I thought that the teachings of the Web were a blessing bestowed upon me so that I, its most devoted servant, might achieve such perfection. But only here, now... looking down upon the world..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah schließt die Augen.{/n} "Perfektion ..." {n}Sie richtet ihren Blick auf die Straßen unter euch.{/n} "Ich hielt die Lehren des Netzes immer für einen Segen, der mir gewährt wurde, damit ich, seine treueste Dienerin Perfektion erlange. Doch erst hier, jetzt ... wenn ich auf die Welt hinabblicke ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah closes her eyes.{/n} "Perfection..." {n}She turns to gaze at the streets below.{/n} "All this time, I thought that the teachings of the Web were a blessing bestowed upon me so that I, its most devoted servant, might achieve such perfection. But only here, now... looking down upon the world..."

Doch erst hier, jetzt ... wenn ich auf die Welt hinabblicke ..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos.{/n} «La perfección...». {n}Se gira para observar las calles desde la barandilla.{/n} «Durante todo este tiempo, creía que las enseñanzas del Camino eran una bendición otorgada a mí, su sierva más devota, para que alcanzara la perfección. Pero es aquí y ahora... mirando al mundo a mis pies...».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah closes her eyes.{/n} "Perfection..." {n}She turns to gaze at the streets below.{/n} "All this time, I thought that the teachings of the Web were a blessing bestowed upon me so that I, its most devoted servant, might achieve such perfection. But only here, now... looking down upon the world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos.{/n} «La perfección...». {n}Se gira para observar las calles desde la barandilla.{/n} «Durante todo este tiempo, creía que las enseñanzas del Camino eran una bendición otorgada a mí, su sierva más devota, para que alcanzara la perfección. Pero es aquí y ahora... mirando al mundo a mis pies...».

languages.text: {n}キベラが目を閉じる。{/n}「完璧…」{n}彼女は下の方の街路へと視線を向ける。{/n}「これまでずっと、ウェブの教えとは、最も献身的な従者である我が完璧な存在になるべくして授けられた祝福だと思っていました。だけど、ここでだけは、今…世界を見下ろしていると…」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah closes her eyes.{/n} "Perfection..." {n}She turns to gaze at the streets below.{/n} "All this time, I thought that the teachings of the Web were a blessing bestowed upon me so that I, its most devoted servant, might achieve such perfection. But only here, now... looking down upon the world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが目を閉じる。{/n}「完璧…」{n}彼女は下の方の街路へと視線を向ける。{/n}「これまでずっと、ウェブの教えとは、最も献身的な従者である我が完璧な存在になるべくして授けられた祝福だと思っていました。だけど、ここでだけは、今…世界を見下ろしていると…」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈闭上了双眼。{/n}“完美……”{n}她转过身，凝视着下方的街道。{/n}“一直以来，我都坚信教义是赐予我的祝福，只有最虔诚的信徒才能得到这样的礼物，只有遵循那样的道路，才能至臻完美。可现在，当我站在这里……俯视这个世界……”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah closes her eyes.{/n} "Perfection..." {n}She turns to gaze at the streets below.{/n} "All this time, I thought that the teachings of the Web were a blessing bestowed upon me so that I, its most devoted servant, might achieve such perfection. But only here, now... looking down upon the world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈闭上了双眼。{/n}“完美……”{n}她转过身，凝视着下方的街道。{/n}“一直以来，我都坚信教义是赐予我的祝福，只有最虔诚的信徒才能得到这样的礼物，只有遵循那样的道路，才能至臻完美。可现在，当我站在这里……俯视这个世界……”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ferme les yeux.{/n} « La perfection... » {n}Elle tourne son regard vers les rues en contrebas.{/n} « J'ai toujours cru que les enseignements de la Toile étaient une bénédiction qui m'avait été accordée, à moi, sa servante la plus dévouée, afin que je puisse atteindre l'ultime perfection. Mais ici, maintenant... quand je vois le monde... »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah closes her eyes.{/n} "Perfection..." {n}She turns to gaze at the streets below.{/n} "All this time, I thought that the teachings of the Web were a blessing bestowed upon me so that I, its most devoted servant, might achieve such perfection. But only here, now... looking down upon the world..."

Mais ici, maintenant... quand je vois le monde... »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Mükemmellik..." {n}Bakışlarını aşağıdaki sokaklara çeviriyor.{/n} "Tüm bu zaman boyunca Ağ'ın öğretilerinin bana bahşedilen bir lütuf olduğunu, Ağ'ın en sadık hizmetkârı olarak böylesine bir mükemmelliğe erişebileceğimi sanmıştım. Ancak burada, şimdi... Dünyaya yukarıdan bakarken..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah closes her eyes.{/n} "Perfection..." {n}She turns to gaze at the streets below.{/n} "All this time, I thought that the teachings of the Web were a blessing bestowed upon me so that I, its most devoted servant, might achieve such perfection. But only here, now... looking down upon the world..."
